flavor: In a few places, the ancient lords of the eladrin maintain their shrinking Feywild domains and guard them from mortal knowledge. To ensure that the secret doors to those realms remain hidden, the eladrin dispatch spies and watchers into the mortal world. You are one of these veiled warriors, and it is your duty to study mortal affairsâ€”and, when you can, to act against those whose defiling or recklessness puts your homeland at risk. Whom do you serve? What enemies do you oppose to keep your home safe?
name: Veiled Warrior
